com.fasterxml.storemate.store.util

Class CountingInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • com.fasterxml.storemate.store.util.CountingInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class CountingInputStream
extends InputStream
    Wrapper for InputStream that keeps track of number of bytes read and skipped. It can also optionally calculate checksum over read data.
    Since:
    0.9.12
